Class Team

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.Team
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class Team
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    represents a team of a battleships game
    Author:
    rverbist
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
